channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache NuttX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache NuttX

item.title: CVE-2021-26461|2024-08-03T20:26:25.470Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20nuttx
item.description: Apache Nuttx Versions prior to 10.1.0 are vulnerable to integer wrap-around in functions malloc, realloc and memalign. This improper memory assignment can lead to arbitrary memory allocation, resulting in unexpected behavior such as a crash or a remote code injection/execution.
